mosinstall.name: ReMOSitory
mosinstall.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
mosinstall.description: Adds SEO support for ReMOSitory component.

param.name: ignoreSource
param.label: Ignore multiple sources:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid handling:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour with your own Itemid.

param.name: overrideId
param.label: Override Itemid:
param.description: Itemid to always use with this component. Leave blank to use the default one.

param.name: fileid
param.label: Add file ID to URL:
param.description: In case there are files with the same title you can choose to add their ID to URL to distinguish them.

param.name: categories
param.label: Add categories to URL:
param.description: Controls the way categories are added to URL.

param.name: categoryid
param.label: Add category ID to URL:
param.description: In case there are categories with the same name you can choose to add their ID to URL to distinguish them.
